text: Robert Charles Holm (January 22, 1919 – April 14, 2002) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Sheboygan Red Skins and Hammond Calumet Buccaneers and averaged 5.2 points per game. He also played in the American Basketball League, the New York State Professional Basketball League, and the Professional Basketball League of America. Bobby Holm is the cousin of Olympic gold medalist swimmer Eleanor Holm. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2002 deaths Category:American Basketball League (1925–1955) players Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Hammond Calumet Buccaneers players Category:Professional Basketball League of America players Category:Seton Hall Pirates men's basketball players Category:Sheboygan Red Skins players Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn
title: Bobby Holm
